item.title: Mark Stevens Joins Golden State Warriors Ownership Group | THE OFFICIAL SITE OF THE GOLDEN STATE WARRIORS
item.description:
Mark Stevens Joins Golden State Warriors Ownership Group | THE OFFICIAL SITE OF THE GOLDEN STATE WARRIORS

"We're extremely excited about the addition of Mark to our ownership group," said Lacob. "He brings an incredible track record of success in the business world, primarily as a venture capitalist in the Bay Area, and his expertise on many levels will certainly aid us in our quest to become a World Class organization.

item.title: Colossal
item.description:
Colossal

Commercial photographer Sam Kaplan 's latest project, transforms sticks of chewing gum into monumental structures, stacking the sticky treat in shapes that imitate architectural forms. Hundreds of pieces of gum criss cross and stand upwards to create pyramids, columns, and arches-held tightly together with support from super glue.

item.title: Underwater Dogs: photographs of dogs underwater by Seth Casteel
item.description:
Underwater Dogs: photographs of dogs underwater by Seth Casteel

Underwater Dogs - a book containing over 80 unique photographs of dogs underwater snapped by animal photographer Seth Casteel is published on 25th October 2012 by Headline Books, priced £14.99.

item.title: Bits And Pieces - An organic wave of Hoberman Spheres
item.description:
Bits And Pieces - An organic wave of Hoberman Spheres

Currently on show at Berlin's NOME Gallery is the latest work by Nils VÃ¶lker titled Bits And Pieces. The installation consists out of 108 mass-produced toy spheres hanging in the middle of the exhibition space, individually addressable and controlled, to create organic waves that appear to move throughout the space.
